sourcesContent:
import { React } from "react"; import { Button } from "../ButtonElements"; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img, ArrowForward, ArrowRight, } from "./InfoElements"; const InfoSection = ({ id, to, lightBg, lightText, darkText, topLine, headline, description, buttonLabel, imgStart, img, alt, dark, primary, }) => { return (
{topLine} {headline} {description}
); }; export default InfoSection;
